优化纳洛酮试剂盒分布以防止阿片类药物死亡多伦多大学工程研究人员的一项新研究指出，通过优化纳洛酮试剂盒的分布来防止阿片类药物中毒死亡的实用策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/optimizing-naloxone-kit-distribution-to-prevent-opioid-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/optimizing-naloxone-kit-distribution-to-prevent-opioid-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c2ec62b-b1ed-4699-962a-962a-9fdb3c9382ae Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:26:00 -0400 Optimizing naloxone kit distribution to prevent opioid deaths
了解铁依赖性铁毒在免疫抑制中的作用铁依赖性铁凋亡是一种非凋亡细胞死亡机制，它因其在免疫抑制中的作用而引起人们的注意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/understanding-the-the--role-of-rir-iron-depertent-ferroptosis-in-mmmune-suppression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/understanding-the-the-the-the--role-of-rir-dipper--ferroptosis-in-roptosis-in-mmmmune-suppression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97CCDB50-F30C-4E30-8E9D-832CA8E2DC3E Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:22:00 -0400 Understanding the role of iron-dependent ferroptosis in immune suppression
研究表明，Covid-19锁定后法国的门诊抗生素使用情况下降法国的COVID-19大流行和锁定措施影响了医疗保健的获取和处方模式，从而导致门诊（卧床）抗生素的使用显着变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/study-shows-decline-in-bambulatoration-randibotic-use-use-inbiotic-use-in-france-forlance-follance-following-covid-covid-19-lockdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/study-shows-nows-decline-in-bambulatoration-andbulatory-antbulatoric-use-use-in-france-forclance-follance-following-covid-covid-19-lockdown.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=259572F6-4874-4D72-9DAA-A37B9BE2562B Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:18:53 -0400 Study shows decline in ambulatory antibiotic use in France following COVID-19 lockdown

用聚糖技术在IVF中提高精子生存能力体外受精的成功取决于许多因素，其中之一就是精子生存能力。伊利诺伊大学Urbana-Champaign大学的最新研究记录了一种选择可行的精子并延长实验室的生存能力的新方法，从而降低了过程中一种可变性的来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/sperm-vialial-boosted-in-ivf-with-with-with-glycan-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/sperm-vialial-boosted-in-ivf-with-with-with-glycan-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcdda389-7408-4488-4488-AEE2-403CA79748F0 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:07:41 -0400 Sperm viability boosted in IVF with glycan technology
